measure_points.query: from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 or http.statusCode <= 399) where appName='210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri = '/group/prp'
from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >= 200 and http.statusCode <=399) where appName='210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp/home'

from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) where appName='210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp/tools-catalog'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'PRP_WorkLoad_Observability_22FEB'

select percentage(count(*), where responseCode <400) as success, max(duration) as duration, max(durationReceive) as request from SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA' and hierarchicalURL='prp-dxp.it.hpe.com/group/prp'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

touchpoints.value: # of User Impacted due to Failures

measure_points.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp' and http.statusCode >= 400 and http.statusCode <=599
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp/esm'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp/esm'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'PRP_WorkLoad_Observability_22FEB'

select percentage(count(*), where responseCode <400) as success, max(duration) as duration, max(durationReceive) as request from SyntheticRequest where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA' and hierarchicalURL='hp--community.force.com/partnerlightning/s/opportunity/Opportunity/Default'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' 
and request.uri='/q2cwngq/selfservice/getEmptyQuote'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName ='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and
request.uri='/q2cwngq/opty/lookup'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND 
request.uri='/q2cwngq/itemDetail/getNewItemDetail'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri='/q2cwngq/ocaConfig/getBomByUcid' or request.uri='/q2cwngq/ocacomparison/checkifmerge' or request.uri= '/q2cwngq/importMultipleUcids' or request.uri='/q2cwngq/itemDetail/getBundleBOM'

from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) as percentage where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD'

SELECT filter(percentage(count(result),WHERE result='SUCCESS'),WHERE 1=1) as success, max(duration) as duration, max(longRunningTasksAvgTime) as request from SyntheticCheck,SyntheticRequest WHERE entityGuid ='Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and http.statusCode >=400 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and http.statusCode >=400 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'

select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) from Transaction where appName in ('211240-ADDISON-Production-pricing-services', '211240-ADDISON-Production-pricing', '211240-ADDISON-Production-deal-services') and (request.uri='/api/deal-offers' or request.uri='/api/get-exchange-rate' or request.uri='/api/get-ibp-exclusion' or request.uri='/api/get-ibp-percentage' or request.uri='/api/pricing/flexible-ibp' or request.uri ='/api/promotion-deals' or request.uri='/api/search/products' or request.uri='/api/v2/discount-indicators' or request.uri ='/api/v2/pricing/promotion-deals' or request.uri ='/api/v2/simulations/offer-prices' or request.uri ='/api/v3/simulate-sales-orders')

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri = '/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/toleranceLevel'

select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) from Transaction where appName in ('200394-Pricing Analytics-Production', '200394-Pricing Analytics-Production-Optimus') and request.uri='/optimus/services/OptimusService'

from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) where appName in ('213083-Pricing Analytics-PRD-PPSS','213083-Pricing Analytics-PRD') and request.uri='/axis2/services/PricingService'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqaction/autoSave'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD'

SELECT filter(percentage(count(result),WHERE result='SUCCESS'),WHERE 1=1) as success, max(duration) as duration, max(longRunningTasksAvgTime) as request from SyntheticCheck,SyntheticRequest WHERE entityGuid ='Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE http.statusCode >=400 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/getDealRegBenefits'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE http.statusCode >=400 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/preCompleteCheck'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri = '/q2cwngq/ngq/ngq/bundleCheck'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngq/ngq/submitToClic'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and request.uri ='/q2cwngq/prevalidation/dataCheck'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqedm/createDealWin'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqaction/updateQuote'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids' and http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD'

SELECT filter(percentage(count(result),WHERE result='SUCCESS'),WHERE 1=1) as success, max(duration) as duration, max(longRunningTasksAvgTime) as request from SyntheticCheck,SyntheticRequest WHERE entityGuid ='Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids' and http.statusCode >=400

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids' and http.statusCode >=400

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=399) WHERE appName='211240-ADDISON-Production' AND request.uri LIKE '%customer-preference%'

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/fannr/getFanFromClic'

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/getlocation' or request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/lookup' or request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/search'

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where http.statusCode >=200 and http.statusCode <=399) WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD'  and request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/ws/cto/convert'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name='NGQC_WorkLoad_Observability_22FEB'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( max(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD'
